{ call PKG_LOAN_INTEREST_ETM.P_START( #{no_person, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no_manage_info, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p_rtn_cd, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, resultMap=myMap}, #{p_rtn_msg, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR, resultMap=myMap}) }
